MESSAGE.UPDATE: An update to v{{version}} is available!
MESSAGE.MANUAL_UPDATE:
An update is available.
You will be redirected to the download page of the newest version.
MESSAGE.LOGOUT:
Are you sure you want to log out of your Blacknut account?
Please confirm.
MESSAGE.GENERIC_ERROR: An error occured, please try again later.
MESSAGE.CRITIC_ERROR: An critical error occurred, please relaunch the application.
MESSAGE.PLAYER_START_ERROR: Game failed to start, please try again.
MESSAGE.UNSUBSCRIBE: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
MESSAGE.UNSUBSCRIBE_SUCCESS:
Your suscription has been cancelled.
You will no longer be charged.

We've sent you a confirmation email.

You can continue using the service until {{date}}.

We hope to see you soon.
MESSAGE.SET_STRIPE_SUCCESS:
Your payment was successful.
Thank you for subscribing!
MESSAGE.UPDATE_EMAIL_SUCCESS: Your request has been received. Instructions for completing the change have been sent to your new email address.
MESSAGE.UPDATE_PASSWORD_ERROR: Wrong password. Please correctly type your current password in order to change it.
MESSAGE.LOST_PASSWORD_DEMAND: Your password change request has been received. We've sent you an email to confirm the change.
MESSAGE.AUTH_FAILED: Authentication failed. Please check your password and try again.
MESSAGE.BIRTHDATE_ERROR: Wrong birthday format. Please check the format and try again.
MESSAGE.INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid password, please check your password and try again.
MESSAGE.EMAIL_ALLREADY_USE: The new email address is already linked to another Blacknut account.
MESSAGE.ACCOUNT_LOCKED:
You've failed 3 login attempts.
Your account has been blocked.
You can change your password by clicking on "Forgot password."
MESSAGE.EMAIL_INVALID: Please provide a valid email address.
MESSAGE.EMAIL_UPDATE_DIFFERENT_ERROR: Your new email address must be different from your current one.
MESSAGE.PASSWORD_UPDATE_DIFFERENT_ERROR: Your new password must be different from your current one.
MESSAGE.PASSWORD_UPDATE_MISMATCH: The new passwords do not match.
MESSAGE.CREDIT_CARD_INVALID: The credit card number you entered is invalid.
MESSAGE.EXPIRATION_DATE_INVALID: Please enter your credit card's expiration date.
MESSAGE.CVV_INVALID: Please enter the security code on the back of your credit card.
MESSAGE.CVV_NOT_MATCHING_CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER: Please enter a valid security code.
MESSAGE.UPDATE_CREDIT_CARD_SUCCESS: Your credit card has been updated.
MESSAGE.UPDATE_DISCOUNT_CODE_SUCCESS: Your promotional code was successfully applied to your account.
MESSAGE.UPDATE_GIFTCARD_SUCCESS: Your gift card was successfully applied to your account.

LOGIN.LOGIN_DESCRIPTION: Log in with the email you used when you created your Blacknut account.
LOGIN.FORGOTPWD_DESCRIPTION: To reset your password, please enter the email associated with your Blacknut account.
LOGIN.MAILSENT_DESCRIPTION: We sent you an email to reset your password.
LOGIN.LOGIN_INVALID: Please provide a valid email address.
LOGIN.PASSWORD_LENGTH_INVALID: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
LOGIN.ACCOUNT_CREATE_DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to Blacknut and get 14 days free!
LOGIN.ACCOUNT_CREATE_NEWSLETTER_LABEL: I want to subscribe to the Blacknut newsletter

ACCOUNT.PAGE_SUBTITLE_CANT_PLAY:
To access the game catalog and play you must be a Blacknut subscriber.
See you on www.blacknut.com
ACCOUNT.GAME_LAUNCH_CANT_PLAY: We're sorry, but your payment method has expired or is not valid. Please update your payment information to continue playing.
ACCOUNT.GAME_LAUNCH_1H_LIMIT: Please enter your credit card information in order to continue your free trial. You will not be charged until the end of your trial period.

SUBSCRIPTION.RENEW_CARD:
To subscribe or change your payment card information, please complete the fields below.

Blacknut does not keep any payment information.
This information is processed in a secure manner.

DISCOUNT.NO_DISCOUNT: No discount activated for this account.

LATENCY.TITLE: Connection speed test
LATENCY.TEST_FAILED:
We tested your internet connection and the connection quality may be suboptimal.

If you have a Wi-Fi connection, move as close as possible to your internet router. If you can, using an RJ45 ethernet network cable might optimize your gaming experience.
LATENCY.TEST_TIMEOUT: An error occured while trying to test your internet speed, please try again.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Thanks for playing.
FEEDBACK.SUBTITLE: For the beta version, we need your participation. Could you please rate your playing experience in order to enhanced Blacknut's service quality?

BUG_REPORT.BUG_REPORT_SUCCESS:
Your message has been sent.
Our team will process your request as soon as possible.

OFFLINE.TEXT:
The content was not downloaded.

Please check your internet connection before trying again.

DISCONNECT_DEVICE.TITLE: Log out of all my devices
DISCONNECT_DEVICE.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to log out of all your devices?
Please confirm.
DISCONNECT_DEVICE.SUCCESS: You've been logged out of all your devices.

CLOSE_APP.TITLE: Close Blacknut
CLOSE_APP.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to close the application?
Please confirm.

APP_TIPS.SKIP_LABEL: Do not show this tip again.

ERRORS.invalid_number: The card number is not a valid credit card number.
ERRORS.invalid_expiry_month: The card's expiration month is invalid.
ERRORS.invalid_expiry_year: The card's expiration year is invalid.
ERRORS.invalid_cvc: The card's security code is invalid.
ERRORS.incorrect_cvc: The card's security code is incorrect.
ERRORS.incorrect_zip: The card's zip code failed validation.
ERRORS.missing: This card is not associated with any customers.
ERRORS.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card.
ERRORS.rate_limit: An error occurred due to requests hitting the API too quickly. Please let us know if you're consistently running into this error.
